pr_title: GEODE-7779: Concourse BumpXYZ does not include {prerelease}

timeline.bodyText: I'm curious about this change, but glad the issue is getting fixed
timeline.author: onichols-pivotal
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -186,7 +186,7 @@ resources:
     driver: gcs
     initial_version: {{ metadata.initial_version }}
     json_key: ((!concourse-gcp-key))
-    key: semvers/((pipeline-prefix))((geode-build-branch))/version
+    key: semvers/((pipeline-prefix))((geode-build-branch))/number

replies.bodyText: This change is to streamline the geode-build-version to use a common file name everywhere. We had version and number being created as part of that resource previously. And even though we define it as version gcp creates a semver resource with the name number.
replies.author: BalaKaza

timeline.message:
GEODE-7779: Concourse BumpXYZ does not include {prerelease}

Update the bump jobs to increment and add the semver release token which
clears the wrong semver picking happening in past few days.

Signed-off-by: Robert Houghton <rhoughton@pivotal.io>
Signed-off-by: Bala Kaza Venkata <bkazavenkata@pivotal.io>

GEODE-7779: Concourse BumpXYZ does not include {prerelease}

Update the bump jobs to increment and add the semver release token which
clears the wrong semver picking happening in past few days.
